title: Is Trey Goody replacing Mike Pines with Gob's 2020 ticket?
subtitle: The curious political rumor is that Vice President Mike Pines will give up the Republican ticket in 2020 to run for the United States Senate in Indiana.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Vice President Mike Pines is giving up JOP tickets in 2020 to run for the United States Senate in Indiana.
